department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada has a requirement for the supply and delivery of one (1) new Self-Propelled Forage Plot Harvester.
description: This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number Doc3489612576 dated 2022/07/06 with a closing of 08/02/2022 at 14:00 CDT. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation. AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 10/14/2022 at 14:00 CDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 CDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada has a requirement for the supply and delivery of one (1) new Self-Propelled Forage Plot Harvester.
